title: Mecha Malphite Chroma W still bugged (long time bug)
body: I reported this bug some time ago, some rioter said the problem was solved, but the problem persists. When using Mecha Malphite skin with a chroma, W loses its animation, and the "brass knuckles" dissapears. The skill only shows a light orange glow on Malphite's hands.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

There was a similar issue that was resolved, however, this issue is requiring more than just an animation fix, which is why it's taking longer than a patch. The TL;DR is that we're enlisting the help of engineers to help us because this isn't simply a change in the animation, but something a bit more complex.

I've gone ahead and pinged the issue again to get a bit more traction on it. Thanks for your patience!

Thank you. I hope it gets fixed soon!

And btw, the passive also loses its animation (when Malph loses his shield and when he regains it).
Quick update here: Looks like there was a fix, but it isn't sticking in terms of building out. Engineers are still digging into this one.
Yea I'm having the same issue. No animation on my W. just a yellow/gold glow around his fists.  Hope it gets fixed soon. :/
